# Organizations and links

## Organizations and people

-   [Rural Schools Association of New York State](https://www.rsany.org/)

-   [Cornell Rural Schools Program](https://cals.cornell.edu/global-development/our-work/our-initiatives/rural-schools-program)

-   The [National Center for Rural Education Research Networks](https://cepr.harvard.edu/rural) (NCRERN), announced Feb. 6 \[2019\], will establish and support a network of 60 school districts in New York and Ohio, as scholars work to address challenges facing rural schools. [John W. Sipple](https://devsoc.cals.cornell.edu/people/john-sipple/), associate professor in the Department of Development Sociology in the College of Agriculture and Life Sciences, joins scholars from Harvard and Dartmouth, plus state government officials in New York and Ohio, in NCRERN.

-   [Rural Center](https://provingground.cepr.harvard.edu/rural) at Harvard. Related to NCERN.
